metadata.title: CVE-2024-42263 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/v3d: Fix potential memory leak in the timestamp extensionIf fetching of userspace memory fails during the main loop, all drm syncobjs looked up until that point will be leaked because of the missingdrm_syncobj_put.Fix it by exporting and using a common cleanup helper.(cherry picked from commit 753ce4fea62182c77e1691ab4f9022008f25b62e)

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
